description:
runtime: switch to 64-bit goroutine ids
Fixes issue 4275.

messages.text:
Can it affect gdb support?

The race detector does not care because it has internal limit of 10^6 goroutines. So it will abort much earlier anyway.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

Thanks, that was easier than I expected.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a88b24459ad8 ***

runtime: switch to 64-bit goroutine ids
Fixes issue 4275.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
